title: Spicy veggie salad
ingredients: ['2 large tomatoes, seeded and chopped', '1 small courgette, diced', '175g (6 oz) frozen sweetcorn', '1/2 bunch spring onions, chopped', '1 avocado - peeled, stone removed and diced', '5 tablespoons spicy sauce or salsa', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '1/2 teaspoon garlic salt', '1/4 teaspoon ground cumin']
